content.rendered:
Family and friends travelled from all over the world to celebrate Amanda and Mark at The Bridge Building.

Their adorable, festive spring wedding incorporated their fun-loving personalities into every little detail. From a clever tongue-in-cheek wedding hashtag to personalized table numbers representing their relationship milestones, every detail was accounted for.

Amanda stayed true to her personal style opting for a stunning strapless, blush-hued dress instead of traditional white. Meanwhile Mark looked dapper in crisp, navy blue.

The couple began their day with an adorable first look at their hotel, The Westin Nashville. With an idyllic modern backdrop of suspended Edison bulbs and glass spheres filled with succulents, Mark was anxious to see his bride for the first time. His reaction says it all!

A rooftop ceremony followed with vows exchanged beneath Forget Me Not Designs' custom floral ring and a slew of white paper lanterns.

Prior to dinner, guests sipped on the couple's signature cocktail, sparkling white wine with raspberry puree, and enjoyed light bites on the riverfront.

Amanda and Mark wanted a fun and festive reception. They chose a classic color scheme of black and white, and used bright spring florals to make the Cumberland space pop.

For dinner, guests enjoyed herb-roasted pork loin and mojito chicken from a buffet spread. Guests left advice and well wishes on printed cards and vied for a candy prize inside two piñatas that looked mysteriously like Amanda and Mark! 😉

A dance party kicked off soon after on a black and white checkerboard dance floor from Liberty Party Rental. The couple danced all night long with music by The Music City Sound.

The evening ended with a sweet sparkler send-off on the Pedestrian Bridge. Congratulations Amanda and Mark!

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: April 21, 2018
Bride & Groom: Amanda and Mark
Location: The Bridge Building
Guest Count: 195
Colors: Black, White, Ivory & Charcoal
Photographer: Frozen Exposure
Florist: Forget Me Not Designs
Cake: Dessert Designs
Music: The Music City Sound
Dance Floor: Liberty Party Rental
Catering: The Bridge Building
Production: Nashville Lighting & Production
Draping: IH
Planning: Haven & Cassidy | IH

excerpt.rendered: A bright and festive spring wedding ceremony and reception at The Bridge Building.
